title: Crab - Animated Creature
description: Crab with over 20 animations and 5 different color variations.
longDescription:
In this pack you will find one crab model with 5 different color schemes and over 20 animations. 

The model is around 16k tris with up to 4k PBR Albedo, Normal, Roughness, and AO maps, so you can scale it up a few times and even use it as a monster in your game! 


Included colors are: 

- "classic" orange/red crab 

- "mud" brown/dark-green crab 

- "beach" white/yellow crab 

- "rainbow" bright orange/red, violet crab 

- "blue" crab 


I've also prepared over 20 animations, which you might find useful: 

- walk forward (loop) 

- walk backward (loop) 

- walk right (loop) 

- walk left (loop) 

- idle stand (loop) 

- idle breaks x3 

- idle sitting (loop) 

- stand to sit 

- sit to stand 

- eating (loop) 

- attack left arm 

- attack right arm 

- block idle (loop) 

- block idle break 

- block hit react front 

- block hit react back 

- idle to block 

- block to idle 

- death x2 

You can preview most of them on Sketchfab by selecting animation in lower left corner. 


Blueprints are not included.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 22 animations
  • 5 different color schemes
  • High quality textures allowing to scale model a few times up without significant quality drop

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

LODs: No

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: 8674

Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096

Number of Animations: 22

Animation types: In-place

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
